body.p: Which of the following variables is quantitative? Check all that apply.

response.feedback: Incorrect. Hospt is not a quantitative variable. Rather, it is a categorical variable because the numbers represent codes, which are used to identify individual hospitals and place them into categories. As such, the numbers used for the codes (1, 2, 3, 5, and 6) have no arithmetic meaning.
